price: (66) And man [i.e., the disbeliever] says, "When I have died, am I going to be brought forth alive?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu al-insānu a-idhā mā mittu lasawfa ukh'raju ḥayyan
